assetRequirements.purpose: To capture the essence of autumn in Guatemala and attract travelers
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and cultural, showcasing landscapes and local culture
assetRequirements.content_context: Highlighting the beauty of Guatemala during the autumn season with a focus on cultural exploration and adventure.

assetRequirements.purpose: To illustrate the pleasant autumn weather and activities in Guatemala
assetRequirements.visual_style: natural and serene, featuring autumnal colors
assetRequirements.content_context: Showcasing the dry climate and moderate temperatures that make autumn ideal for travel.
